items.title: NEON RAINWALKER
items.prompt: Cinematic shot, vertical aspect ratio, cyberpunk aesthetic, a cyborg woman walking through rainy neon streets of Tokyo, reflection in puddles, atmospheric fog, 8k resolution, highly detailed texture, slow motion.

items.title: ABSTRACT DATA FLOW
items.prompt: Abstract representation of data stream, high speed information tunnel, blue and pink glowing lines, seamless loop, 3d render, octane render style.

items.title: FUTURE SYNTHWAVE
items.prompt: Synthwave style driving loop, retro sunset, grid landscape, endless road, purple and teal color palette, vhs glitch effect overlay.

items.title: DIGITAL PORTRAIT
items.prompt: Close up portrait of a futuristic fashion model, bioluminescent makeup, dynamic lighting changing colors, sharp focus on eyes, shallow depth of field.
